UI.LCD_SCREENSAVER_DOC: How long (in seconds) LCD will keep displaying date & time before entering screen saver mode when no track is being played.
UI.LCD_RESTART_DOC: Use this button to restart  LCD display script.
UI.LCD_ENABLE_DOC: Disable/enable the main display of your RDMLCD
UI.REMOTE_ENABLE_DOC: Disable/enable the Volumio3 remote layer (playback control). The shutdown function is handled by the board and cannot be disabled.
UI.REMOTE_DIAGNOSE_DOC: Click here to querry the system and diagnose the remote services if something seems to be not working as expected.

ERRORS.SYSTEMD_FAIL: Failed to start the service for LCD
